ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/crashappsec/chalk
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Chalk allows you to follow code from development, through builds and into production.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/nim-lang/Nim
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Nim is a statically typed compiled systems programming language. It combines successful concepts from mature languages like Python, Ada and Modula. Its design focuses on efficiency, expressiveness, and elegance (in that order of priority).

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/radkesvat/ReverseTlsTunnel
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Reverse Tcp Tunnel with custom sni handshake, mux support and more...

ns0:entry.ns0:content: Nim implementation of the Ethereum Beacon Chain
